quote_first: Bimingham New Street 5.25. Walsall 5.55. This train does not stop at Birchills, for reasons George has never been able to ascertain. Then it is Bloxwich
quote_last: , Wyrley & Churchbridge 6.09. At 6.10 he nods to Mr Merriman the stationmaster.
title: Arthur and George
author: Julian Barnes
